org.framed.orm.ui.command

Class FulfillRolesCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command
      • org.framed.orm.ui.command.FulfillRolesCommand

  • public class FulfillRolesCommand
extends org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command
    This command is used from the FulfillRolesAction and the RolesDialog to add all of the choosen Shapes from type roletype and rolegroups to the fulfilledRoles list of a Relation from type fulfillment and delete of the not choosen rolegroups and roleTypes from the referencedRoles list of a fulfillment.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FulfillRolesCommand()
      Constructor of this command, where the label is set, which describes this command to the user, and initialize the oldFulfilledRoles list.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canExecute()
      This method tests if the conditions for executing this command are fulfilled,
      void execute()
      In this method the initial content of the fulfilledRoles list of the fulfillment is stored in the oldFulfilledRoles list.
      void setFulfillment(Relation fulfillment)
      Setter for the Relation from type fulfillment.
      void setRoles(java.util.List<Shape> roles)
      Setter for the choosen roles list.
      void undo()
      To undo this command the content of the fulfilledRoles list is deleted and replaced with the initial content of the fulfilledRoles list, which is stored in the oldFulfilledRoles list.

      • Methods inherited from class org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command

        canRedo, canUndo, chain, dispose, getDebugLabel, getLabel, redo, setDebugLabel, setLabel

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • canExecute

        public boolean canExecute()
        This method tests if the conditions for executing this command are fulfilled,
        Overrides:
        canExecute in class org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command
        Returns:
        true if the parameter fulfillment and roles is set.

      • execute

        public void execute()
        In this method the initial content of the fulfilledRoles list of the fulfillment is stored in the oldFulfilledRoles list. After that all content of the fulfilledRoles list is deleted and the choosen Shapess from type roletype and rolegroup are added to the fulfilledRoles list.
        Overrides:
        execute in class org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command

      • undo

        public void undo()
        To undo this command the content of the fulfilledRoles list is deleted and replaced with the initial content of the fulfilledRoles list, which is stored in the oldFulfilledRoles list.
        Overrides:
        undo in class org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command
